allowedParameters.name: disableMinify
allowedParameters.description: Boolean flag to return minified or non minified Javascript links in layout information (for example disableMinify=true). Can only be used in Preview, ignored in Storefront.

allowedParameters.name: dataOnly
allowedParameters.description: Boolean flag to set whether to only return data (for example dataOnly=false).

allowedParameters.name: productTypesRequired
allowedParameters.description: Boolean flag to indicate whether productTypes data is needed in the response. This parameter will be useful only on product and category pages, as productTypes is currently returned in those pages.

allowedParameters.name: layoutOnly
allowedParameters.description: Boolean flag to set whether to only return layout data (for example layoutOnly=true). It can be used only if dataOnly is false.

allowedParameters.name: cacheableDataOnly
allowedParameters.description: Boolean flag to set whether to only cacheable data (for example cacheableDataOnly=true). It can be used only if dataOnly is false.

allowedParameters.name: currentDataOnly
allowedParameters.description: Boolean flag to set whether to only return current data (for example currentDataOnly=true). It can be used only if dataOnly is false.
